mapper.sql: SELECT t.bill_no , t.bill_date , t.`subject`, t.src_no ,bs.`name` supplier_id_dict_text, sd.depart_name op_dept_dict_text,su.realname operator_dict_text, t.amt ,t.checked_amt , sdi.item_text bill_stage_dict_text, t.is_effective ,t.is_closed ,t.is_voided ,t.is_auto , t.is_rubric, t.remark ,t.effective_time , su1.realname approver_dict_text, t.create_time , su2.realname create_by_dict_text, sd1.depart_name sys_org_code_dict_text, t.update_time, su3.realname update_by_dict_text, t.approval_remark, t.attachment, t.approval_result_type, sdi2.item_text src_bill_type_dict_text FROM fin_payable t LEFT JOIN bas_supplier bs ON t.supplier_id = bs.id LEFT JOIN sys_depart sd ON t.op_dept = sd.org_code LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON t.operator = su.username LEFT JOIN sys_user su1 ON t.approver = su1.username LEFT JOIN sys_user su2 ON t.create_by = su2.username LEFT JOIN sys_depart sd1 ON t.sys_org_code = sd1.org_code LEFT JOIN sys_user su3 ON t.update_by = su3.username JOIN sys_dict_item sdi2 ON t.src_bill_type = sdi2.item_value JOIN sys_dict_item sdi ON t.bill_stage = sdi.item_value JOIN sys_dict sdict ON sdi.dict_id = sdict.id
